title: From a game title for which I would like to know if such a font exists
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/banner-for-font-search_4529.jpg)

From the game Dungeonquest. Several people are involved in a few different homemade expansions and we're wondering if this is a font that exists somewhere or if the game developer's graphics division used and then manually modified the rendered title.
author: Sigilist
